attributes.action: Abolish tuition fees for ALL Britsh undergraduates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are paying more and more for our education and not being given enough financal support. Abolish tution fees but raise entrance requirements to British Universities.

rejection.details:
We have a very similar petition already:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/scrapfees/
If you wish your petition to go up anyway, then please resubmit.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
